response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a product worth $1,200,000 at a significant discount. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of facilitating this transaction with you. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 950000}
